transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Yes sir, Mr. Kumar ji baat kar rahe hain progressive offshore and marine services se?
Customer: Ha ji bataiye.
Executive: Ha Kumar sir Praveen bol raha hun Indiamarted office se.
Customer: Ha ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir wo kuch issue tha na leads aur inquiry mein to usi ke regarding maine connect kiya hai sir.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To sir possible hai agar connect kare to main bata deta hun aapko.
Customer: Abhi sham ko connect karenge sir. Monday hai na thoda busy hi rahenge na. Main aapko sham ko connect karwa deta hun.
Executive: Sham ko kitne baje sir ji?
Customer: Aap whatsapp mein message bhejiye main bhijwata hun jaise free hua main aapko text karta hun.
Executive: Achcha wo primary number kiska hai aap hi ka hai?
Customer: Dono mere sath rehte hain.
Executive: Achcha theek hai. Us din to baat hui tha main sham ko dala tha message sir Saturday ko lekin.
Customer: Pahla tha lekin main travelling mein tha na us time mein. To nahi hai us time mein. Main sham ko night mein dekha message wo.
Executive: Okay okay. Theek hai to main 4 baje aap usi number pe whatsapp mein bhej dijiye main sham ko reminder bhej dijiyega. Free rahega to aadha ghanta ke liye zara baith ke baat kare.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay sure sure sir.
Customer: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called regarding leads and inquiry issue.

Resolution:

- Customer will connect in the evening.

- Customer asked to send a message on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a message on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, inquiry, whatsapp, connect
